forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High 14C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High 57F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 48F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High 16C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine. High 21C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Plentiful sunshine. High 69F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 52F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High near 15C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
